lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: [Critical Role theme] Travis Willingham! [cheering] Marisha Ray! [applause] Taliesin Jaffe! [applause] Ashley Johnson! [applause] Sam Riegel! [applause] Liam O'Brien! [cheering] Motherfucking Laura Bailey! [cheering] Ladies and gentlemen, on your feet for Mr. Matthew Mercer! [applause] [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if that isn't a rush, I don't know what is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah. Mainline that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man. Hello everyone, and welcome-- [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He said two words!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Arr.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: AUDIENCEMEMBER
lines.text: We love you, Liam! [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check that out on Monday at twitch.tv/CriticalRole. Also, we do not have a Wyrmwood giveaway this week, because instead, all of our live attendees tonight at the show, when the show is over on your way out, you'll be receiving a $25 Wyrmwood gift card.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa! [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of these characters you may have seen in our pre-stream recap video from years ago. You also get to see-- I think some of these cast hasn't seen them until tonight now. We've got Abjurist Noja, we've got Wilhand Trickfoot up there, we got Pike when her hair was still dark, before her first death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stonejaw Strongjaw!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like how I did that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pull those heart strings. We have our fantastic sponsor for the evening. Since the beginning of the campaign, our good friends at D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To buy your books at steeply discount rates. When you go to D&D Beyond, just mention me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) Sam is our hero and he's handsome too. Look at that smile, and such a boyish face. Oh my god, these lyrics are so crappy. Why did I agree?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This crowd is loving my song!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They think it's slightly too long.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll win a Tony Award after all! I'll do whatever it takes--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This was an awful mistake.

lines.name: SAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam and Ashley, and thank you our friends at D&D Beyond. And thank you Hamilton for hopefully enduring that terrible butchering of a wonderful piece of music.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think when Lin-Manuel wrote the song, he thought that it would be used in a D&D Beyond ad eventually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it was hard to avoid down the road, yeah. Well, all right guys. Let's go ahead and bring us in to tonight's episode of Critical Role.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When do I change into my sailor outfit? [click, TV static] [groovy Critical Role theme] [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back. Do we have the mic working now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you managed to sneak your way back to Nicodranas the following day before it seemed there was much of an uproar searching for you. You stealth hired a crew, including bringing Orly the tortle bard on as your navigator, and made your way out to sea towards this island called Urukaxl that you believed may have been the one, based on this piece of a map that you had recovered within the ship, The Mist. You changed the name of the ship to The Mistake. You became Captain Tusktooth, was it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, own it, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, are you still below deck holding onto your spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. Because I believe that is where we left off. Mighty Nein, as you see these two small boats slowly rowing their way towards you from the far side of the bay, what do you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this like one of those, like a parfait? What's it called?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, with the yogurt? Those are really good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, not that one, when you talk with other people who know how to sail.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Parlay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I think it will be a parlay, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, parfaits are bad?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why unfortunately?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I don't know who these people are, what kind of ship they've come in on. I mean, this can go one of two ways, either very amicably or we all die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think it's the Captain Avantika?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I don't know. Do we have a spyglass onboard this ship? Lead, anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Frumpkin-- [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I said a spyglass and you pulled out a bird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully the intelligent creature managed to swoop up before hitting the surface of the ocean there. Frumpkin continues to head off towards the other ship. At this point in time, the rest of the rowboats travel, just about to reach the bottom of The Mistake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, they're that close?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well yeah, as you're waiting here. If there's anything else you want to prepare in the meantime, I know you had said you changed your form to look like the previous captain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm going to look like the half-orc captain. Was I close enough to hear him talk when he was on the dock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you were far away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, fuck, balls, ass! Okay, so I'm going to make myself look like him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It was less that you were far away and more that you were in the water, and then made a thunder strike, and then were far away, and then he was paralyzed--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I know, we don't have to relive it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reply to that message?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [laughter] [applause and cheering]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell him they might have yogurt with them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make myself look like the Captain Jawgrasp, but can I put like, a bloody bandage around my throat, as if I suffered a wound, and I'll talk like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, do you want us to look like anything along with you, or should we just look like ourselves?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I mean, not that you're already really super dangerous-looking, but maybe you could like, menace it up a little bit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I look like me, only menacing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, your eyebrows just go like this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like that, and like I put a lot of cool tattoos on my arms, and like, I make my fangs even longer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I envision like the anime girl, where like all of a sudden the eyes are covered in shadow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, perfect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My dress is like, tight now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't even know how to interpret this kind of input, god. First of all, I want to see how many people are in these boats coming in, are they--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to roll a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's terrible, but I'm pretty perceptive, so that's, where is that, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're getting pretty close, so it's not a terrible DC at this point in time. There are two figures in one boat and a very large figure in the other, alone. One of the boats is like, sinking in the water, or not really sinking, but is definitely pushing towards the boundaries of buoyancy. The other boat, however, seems to carry two figures, one looks to be a female, a little older, maybe in 50s or 60s, the other figure seems to be the one that's rowing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does her jacket look like? I mean, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say you cannot quite make out that detail from this distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Looks like a jacket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you lowering any of the rope ladders, or?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to tell Beau to go activate the windlass and lower the anchor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go over and I smack Yasha's ass. Is that-- Wait, that's what you said, right? No, nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The windlass!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The wind lass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and we'll make sure that flag is nice and high that had the gray--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I in your way, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I don't know how to sail, so. That's all.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point you hear the two dull (thuds) of the two other small rowboats hitting the bottom of the ship, and you hear the climbing up the side of the boat. Eventually emerging, the first thing you see is one giant meaty hand come over the top of the side of the ship, and rising up, you see a haggard female ogre. You see stringy, greasy hair that's peeling in front of the face, obscuring part of one eye, the other one looks to be a bit clouded. You can see these like streaks of dark, what would've been possibly makeup, and beyond that, a leather tunic and these thick, rippling, muscular arms. She eventually gets over the side of the ship and then puts her hand over and helps the other two up. One of them appears to be a gentleman, probably in his late 30s, mostly bald, a little bit of hair on the sides, a light blond, and he seems to be a little more demure compared to the two. Immediately his gait and presence seems to be more of at least a lower position on the hierarchy of the other ship. The last one that comes up is the woman that you saw. This woman, she's a tougher-looking middle-aged woman, thicker, heftier body, weathered face. She's wearing tattered robes, but beneath that there is a set of leather armor, there is a cutlass to one side, and she has this small amulet that's dangling from a heavy chain around the neck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, before they even come up, I'm going to look like the ship's cook, I am not looking aggressive for this. I am putting on a chef's outfit and getting small and human with awful red hair, so, yeah, I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they step up, the ogre looks around at the rest of you and grins with this broken, toothy glare. (snarls) The woman clears her throat and addresses you. "You are requested to the bows of "The Squalleater immediately."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the ship! That's the ship that she owns!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (pigeon cooing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is recommended by the captain that you immediately make your way across with whatever "boats you have available. There's a space for some with us, but should you decline or make any move "outside of complete and utter compliance, you and your ship will sink."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (rasping) Actually, funny you mention sinking our boat. Sustained some damage, so if I could request of the captain, perhaps some grace while we go into shore. I'm afraid if we try to make it to her ship, we might be on the bottom of the ocean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he has a hard time talking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She turns to you with like an intense glare and goes, "Jawgrasp, you seem to have sustained "some sort of terrible wound."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, my throat, it's all fucked up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yas, queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you come with whatever your most immediate crew is," and she looks about and says, "And it would appear that you've lost most of your previous crew?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, heavy casualties. Yeah. The butcher's bill was very steep, yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you bring unproven individuals into our plans?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But these are battle-hardened men and women, every one of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Arr!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah ha! [laughter]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yo ho! Ho?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The woman glares back and forth across the troupe of you and goes, "Well then, some of you "come onto the ship, the rest, take it into shore with Bouldergut." Points to the ogre, and the ogre goes, "(grunts) To shore."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus. Do you think you can accommodate seven of us on your two craft?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you not have a ship of yourself?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we have this boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a rowboat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a rowboat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We will accompany you to The Squalleater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then come, please." She immediately starts to climb down with the help of Bouldergut the ogre. Down into one boat, the helper that she was with goes down with her, and there are now the two rowboats and the rowboat that you have at your disposal. It looks like the ogre is staying onboard to help whoever's behind take The Mistake to shore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll turn to the rest of the crew and be like, just do whatever, she-- he?-- she says.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snarls) Big, big grin. The rest of the crew, who has known you for three days, goes like, "Huh." They start getting the ropes ready, start pulling the anchor up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's awful grumpy below decks. He needs to be on the part of the boat with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want me to go get Caleb?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, go get fucking Caleb!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think in addition to your throat getting slashed, you might've sustained a bump on the head or something. I'll go get Caleb. I run downstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a terrifying fighter. Just make sure he's on the boats!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go get Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you're sitting there concentrating with all this going on, the tension of what we were just told by Fjord a moment ago, you watch as Nott runs down to grab you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm inside a giant sphere of glass, basically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you keep it going, but not be here? Because we have to go. We have to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I cannot do that. I have to stay here in this bubble or the boat will sink, presumably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will it sink quickly or slowly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well it lasted between ten and 20 minutes while I got this going, but I am not a boat expert. That's Fjord's MO, so I can't say for certain how long this will stay afloat, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, we've got to make this decision on our own. He's entrusted me to come get you. We have to go on this boat with these pirates, or else we'll all be killed. Can you just temp it in, just like, rough it in? Just sort of close the wound as much as you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nein, I cannot do that, but I could walk away from this. Are we all leaving? There are actually pirates above?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There are real pirates. We're going to get on a boat with them and go to another, to see other pirates, but everything's okay. Everything's going to be fine, because Fjord has convinced them that he's the guy that we killed before, except with a massive throat laceration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I am trying to process this as quickly as I can. I'm glad that I spent all the time making this. Let's go, fuck it. I walk out of Leomund's Tiny Hut. It goes (whooshes), gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you watch as this sphere immediately vanishes as you exit the exterior of it, and what brief repairs were placed against there seem to hold for the time being. There is a slow leak. You do see it is taking on water, but it is, at the moment, a trickle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Gallan still down there fixing it up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the rest of this journey when you came out of the reef, Gallan had done his best to repair it, but there's only so much you can patch something like that. It may hold for a while, who knows? Gallan literally as this is happening sees the leak and goes like, "Okay, you know, this is-- "it should work. As long as we don't stay out here for too long, I think we'll be okay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. As we go up topside, I say quietly to Nott: You know, I did not allow for Gallan to go inside the bubble, so it's all the same to him, let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great, perfect. Have fun wherever you're going."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, you'll be fine down here. We'll send word soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You said something about pirates?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clears throat) No. High rats. There were rats on the top of the mast and we took care of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No good at these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Oh, I mean, I hate fucking rats."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm glad you took care of them. That gets real bad as far as the food stores down here in "the cargo hold. Thank you for that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aye aye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, toodaloo!" Sits down and gets himself an orange, unaware.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That poor bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys make your way back to the deck of the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and going up also, I grab hold of that leather thong that's tied around my thigh and I cast Mage Armor on the way up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. Leather thong!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hope that's written in your inventory.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't do it right now! Wait till we're on the-- yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your bird's spying on pirates.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tally ho.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so are you all getting in the boats, or are some of you staying behind? What's the plan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's all get in the boats.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think better together than not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. All of you make your way down into one of the three boats, and begin rowing your way across this gulf to the ship. Now as you approach this ship, you can see it's a massive, tri-mast ship. You can see where those doors were open, there are large, heavy cannons facing your direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Coming out of the gun port? [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I'm so proud of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (mocking) Ha ha. You're so pretty!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, so, as you make your way towards this massive ship, the large rope-- I want to say a ladder more than a giant net-looking ladder, is thrown over the side that hits and breaks the surface for a bit so that it floats. The boats come up to the side and the older woman is inside the boat, gives a look to the rest of you and goes, "After you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Arr.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's women and children first that are supposed to go, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's not right at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll go first, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Yep, I mean, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are climbing, you see The Mistake is now being led over towards shore. You make your way to the top of the deck, and as you come across, one by one, you see there waiting for you is about ten figures, all in various scattered bits of seafaring attire, leathers and billowing cloths that seem to have seen many a journey out here on the open Lucidian Ocean. Immediately, your attention is grabbed by the central figure, a female elf, with light brown skin, with red, wild hair that falls in clustered strings around her face and down the back. You see she's wearing a long, sleeveless gray coat with a high collar that bends at the edge of the shoulders, with a thick scarf around her neck. You see she has heavy elbow-length gloves and knee-high boots that look weathered with use and probably brutality. They are stained in places where that could only have been acquired by meeting the face of somebody else. As you step up, she has her arms crossed in front of her, cocks her head to the side and looks to you specifically and goes, (french accent) "Well hello, Captain. You have returned from your journey, Jawgrasp?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We suffered heavy damage and casualties, but we have returned, successful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Successful? Well wondrous. Please, give me the item requested." [laughter]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, when he means successful, he means unsuccessful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who are you?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Captain, it would appear to me that you have brought The Mist all this way across our "specific route through the reef with a crew that I have not met, please introduce me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yes, we actually came under such heavy heat we had to rebrand the ship as The Mistake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This surprises me not at all." [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: May I introduce--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tracy the bowman.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tracy Bowman. Next to Tracy you will see...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My name is Phillip. Bone-jour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Phillip is a talented bosun. May I also introduce the tall and powerful--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What'd she say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Janet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Janet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She nods along, with a very confused look on her face.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good. She's great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all going to die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cornelius, and I apologize for the way I'm dressed right now. I was in the middle of-- well, it's obvious I was making a stew, this really nice vegetable stew, and everything went topsy-turvy so quick, I don't even--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was so good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very good stew.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's very talented.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a talented cook, that one. What was your name again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cornelius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Corneli-- yeah, the food just blows your mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sometimes they call me Stew because I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cornelius. Very well, I look forward to seeing what you are capable of cooking up, Cornelius."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm very excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This one?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a pirate! [laughter, cheering]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: hashtag I'm A Pirate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm Pirate Sapphire.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's adorable."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Argh, thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What about this little runt you brought on?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was told this was only going to be about three hours long. To be honest with you, I thought we were going on a pleasure cruise. But you know, I've met some people, and we've had a great time, and yeah. Really nice boat you got here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Folded. "Jawgrasp, so you come to me with a new crew, and you tell me that you are successful but "yet you are not. Describe to me what transpired to prevent you from acquiring this thing you have paid for."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well you see, we now know the location of the artifact you seek. It's as good as ours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How did this terrible, terrible thing happen to you?" She reaches up and touches the side of your neck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her hand passes through--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's real sore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [groaning]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit, shit, shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All part of the plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I must commend you, it has been a very long time since someone has been so bold with such "massive balls to come onto my ship. And I think that perhaps I got where I am today not by seeing "through a few paltry illusions."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will drop the mask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have them trained on the lot of you. The captain still now has her hands crossed in front of you and goes, "Well, I guess now that we are out in the open, who the fuck are you and how did "you come in the possession of The Mist?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But there are only seven of you." [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a long story, but I'm afraid we won't be able to tell it or further converse unless we have an atmosphere of equal exchange here, and this hostile act is not a step in the right direction, Captain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you are the captain of that ship. Are you suggesting that we parlay?" [laughter]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Say yes, Fjord. Say yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Well, since you've been so forthright, Tracy, Phillip, Sapphire, Cornelius, "Janet, and Gilli-gone?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Gilli-gone? Hon hon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Welcome aboard the Squalleater. I am Captain Avantika. Now, the fact that you are here, "that you've made your way across the reef, that you managed to best our sister ship and the crew "on board, which I assume have all been dispatched?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just out of curiosity, if I look back over my shoulder, do I still see a boat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah! [laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's noticeably lower. In maybe a short ten minute period, it'll be finding its way onto the beach.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's also got a giant fucking ogre on it now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I look around real quick and see if I see Frumpkin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a Perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sleeves are so big. Shit. I think that was an eight?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get your hat out of the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is not a good dice for this lighting. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them does look small, might be him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I lost another fucking owl, goddamn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hear her say that, and for ten or 15 seconds, jump into Frumpkin's vision to see what I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now you look up and you can see through Frumpkin's vision, down on the deck, Frumpkin has a view from above and is present. The captain continues. "Well, then my next question "is, what are you planning here? Why have you gone to all this trouble to kill my crew, to bring the "ship right back to me and then, to be perfectly honest, prostrate yourself before us?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well I imagine there must be a hefty reward for the item that you seek. We went through great troubles just to acquire it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Troubles?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perhaps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you know the purpose of this item?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks at you with an eye that has tore through a thousand lies, and gives a surprising smile of acknowledgement. "Interesting. Well, you've proven that you are talented, at least, to "have survived this far. But I'm a bigger fan of loyalty. Talent and loyalty, well, that is "obviously my birthday. As it stands, The Mighty Nein, there are two paths you can walk. You, one, "could live under the crew and proves yourselves as both skilled and as trustworthy as I hope you may "be, if our goals are indeed aligned. Perhaps even join us, if the deeds please me. Or two, we weigh "your corpses down with rocks and leave you here amongst the reef."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are the only options there? [laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm afraid so, little Sapphire."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Captain, what was your actual name?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Captain Fjord. What'll it be?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's actually Captain Tusktooth, but-- (clears throat)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll stick with Fjord."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cornelius, what say you in this highly delicate matter?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm unhappy with everything at the moment. I would really like to negotiate some base points of this deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment you say this, you feel this cold sensation in the back of your skull as one of the cocked rifles is now pressed up against the base of the head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I know what a rifle is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what a co--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, that's cold. (laughs) Oh, that's really cold. Oh, ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "There is no negotiation. I'm sorry, but the choice you make now, that is--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is not necessary. We would absolutely love to prove our loyalty in your service.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would say this, though. Just as a curious tourist, if you were to kill us you would not find the location of the item.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, based on the fact that you brought yourselves this far to tell me that you have it, I "would assume that it's somewhere either on your ship across the way that I currently am in "possession of, or it's on your person, so we could rummage through your bodies to find it afterwards." [laughter]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far would that rummaging entail? Just curious how far you would look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a really popular play, I don't...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm afraid I'm not as involved in the arts as some, perhaps." She puts her hand up and raises her fingers twice, and you feel the pressure of the barrel back off, and all the guns eventually, they stay trained on you, but they pull back a bit and go lax a little bit. "Do you agree?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have a choice, so yes, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a resounding yes, of course.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well then, Mighty Nein, welcome to the Squalleater." (claps) All the guns pull back a bit. Everyone stays present, and they're keeping an eye on you. As much as this agreement has happened, there's still a sense of careful watchfulness from the crew, but Avantika seems to drop that intensity and reaches forward a hand to shake yours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we pick our quarters first? Or do we get assigned roles? Or is there a uniform that we need to wear?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the yogurt come before or after? Really looking forward to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're hungry, there are plenty of fruits that have dropped from the trees on the "island. First order of business, some of my men are going to work to begin repairing my other "ship. In the meantime, you relax, bring your things aboard. I would like to question some of "you about what you know."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: By all means.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the captain turns to the older woman who accompanied you and goes, "Vera. Let me introduce "you to your charges for the evening."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Jesus!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb died!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one of us was shot?! Caduceus has been shot! [laughter]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, guys. We've never been on stage before. It's a learning curve. We'll figure it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The captain, "I will return in just a little bit, but in the meantime, Vera can answer your "questions. Don't do anything stupid."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Never.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome. Are you hungry?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Always, yes, of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Usually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With me." She turns around and begins to leave. You begin to see in the distance another boat. One of the boats that you guys had taken to the ship has made its way in the direction of The Mistake. What would you like to do while you're here on the ship?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll make my way over to Janet-- Yasha and take her by the arm and say, you okay with this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well I don't know if I trust her, or what she wants with the sphere. Maybe you should ask her if she knows what it does?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I ask her about it. Let her know that I don't know anything.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you don't think she'd believe me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what if one of us asked her what it does? Like you won't tell us or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a fine idea. Yeah, like I hoard the information?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I like that you brought Yasha aside and then all of us just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jumped right in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, I couldn't help but hear what you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very small ship. Yeah. Work your magic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. We're going to ask Avantika if she will tell us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If she'll tell us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because he won't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But why would she tell us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because we're very charming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long are we going to hold these disguises?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I think I look really good, so as long as it lasts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we off on our own a little bit from everyone training guns upon us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're still watching you. You're still on the deck, but you have some time to discuss or anything you want to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not making any movements to move the ship, it's just staying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is our plan here? I'm trying to move my lips as little as possible. We go with this for the time being? Then when the moment is right, we get away? Or are we just pirates now? [laughter]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I second that question.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's about all I got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I want to figure out if she's just another matchmaker or keeping it for herself if that is a thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Oh shit, is Marius LePual back on the other ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, we forgot Marius!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That poor bastard. Oh shit, our fucking tortle!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not leaving though, we're not leaving anywhere. They're going to fix that ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They better not sink!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she said we could go back and get our things. They're our things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They need to crew that ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like Orly. Yeah, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would warrant a guess that we are stuck here for the time being, but I think at a certain point we are going to want to go, and if that happens, all of you, if you see a window in which we can get away, tell Nott or myself, and we will start a snow chain.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will tell our friends that it's time to get out of here. Just find you or me, and we spread it quickly, so we don't leave anyone behind like we almost fucked off without Caduceus, from the docks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry again about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's okay. I wasn't that worried.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. I feel like we can make some ground without fighting if we have to, I feel like we can find out what we need and maybe slip away, I think that's a great idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, okay, but still, why would we run if we don't know what this thing is inside of you? I'm assuming you want it out of you, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I kind of fucking like it, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we just need information and then we run?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, they're also fixing the ship. At some point, there's two ships.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The things they're doing on the mast. Rigging, right? Try and familiarize yourself with working a boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit, we're supposed to learn from these people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think for the time being, we are in fact pirates, and that Fjord, you're absolutely correct, learn as much as possible, and when the opportunity is right we leave, but for now, we have to swiff them, they are our new best buddies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, yeah, our partners.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Captain Tusktooth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, Sapphire?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you maybe make some more of those Idiot's Guides and spread them around through the rest of us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: More of the what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is mine. I earned this. And it's not actually in the game!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within a short time of you guys having this conversation, Vera returns to the deck of the ship and goes, "The captain would like you to please join her in the quarters below, please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'll be our pleasure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys follow Vera down below to the dark, and it takes a second for your eyes to adjust going from the bright daylight to the darker quarters in the deck below, but you're led to the captain's quarters, this beautiful open room with a mismatched patchwork of old carpets that have all been laid over each other from various designs from around Exandria. There's a desk that has a bunch of carve marks into it, there's some papers laid out, and there you can see Avantika, sitting with her legs up on the desk, currently eating on some sort of a tropical fruit, watching you all enter with a bit of a grin on her face. "Please, fill the space."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, mind if we partake of your beautiful spread here? Is there food in this bitch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes actually, on the right side of the room, there is a small pack of freshly collected tropical fruits, there's some nuts, a cheese that's been designed for longer travel and will keep well. "By all means, please."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gobbling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Paring knife.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a candle bar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doors close behind you, but before the doors close, all the rest of the crew that were armed are essentially right nearby waiting to storm in at any given point in time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outside the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right outside the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it essentially us and the captain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just you and the captain, from what you can tell. It's just you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there like portcullis windows? Is that-- no? Are there windows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a couple of windows and a doorway behind her that leads to a balcony that looks out the back of the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does she have papers and shit everywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a couple of papers. Actually, you see a familiar-looking map.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Akin to what you guys were supposed to have last week, but the mail service decided not to have it. We have the map of the Menagerie Coast and another map that has a similar layout to what you found mostly burned in The Mist. As well as a few other pieces of paper that appear to be tucked away into portions of the desk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they're having a conversation, I want to do a scan and see if I can see any floorboards that look like they can be popped up, maybe marks on the floor from chests, anything that looks like it could be a secret compartment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check. Actually, this would be a perception check. It's just a glance, but it's going to be a higher DC. Investigation, you'd have to actually physically rummage through the room, so make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also glancing around for books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, that's balls, big balls. Fjord-size balls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled balls?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going to get you a d20, that instead of a one, it has a pair of balls. Right there, yeah. An eight? The room looks pretty solidly made, and the floorboard, while there are scuffs to it, there's nothing that gives you the idea that there would be any hidden compartment or any sort of small cubby that would be out of view. What'd you get?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't quite see the binder, or if there is anything written on the sides. It's pretty plain-bound. Anyways, the door's closed. The captain looks to you and goes, "All right, so now that you've agreed to become our friend, I would "like to see the first test of you proving your loyalty. You have this item I require? You have it "here? Where is it?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's very dangerous. Before we tell you anything about it, we want to make sure that you know how to handle it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Little goblin girl, trust me. I have a decent idea of what I'm doing."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A decent idea? We've seen it do things, scary things. We've seen someone melt while touching it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 12. Oh, minus three. A nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes-- nein-- "Oh my goodness, that sounds terrible. Well, obviously we cannot have "you touching it, then."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you don't mind my asking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please, cut through the bullshit for me, please, Captain Fjord."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tusktooth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Will you tell me if I call you Tusktooth?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then, Captain Tusktooth, please tell me." [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's trying to use them titties. Don't fall for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like if you tell us your story, we'll share in that sense of triumph.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Respectfully, you're not in a position, once again, to negotiate. You tell me and I'll "tell you, a little back and forth. Honestly, the one who has to prove their loyalty right now is "not myself."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're correct. I have it on very good authority that an island that is surrounded by the Deeprow Reef is housing the item you seek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wonder how it found its way there?" Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know precisely where it lies in the reef?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Show me," and she pushes forward the map, the same similar map to what you were given. You have it with you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do. Fuck, I picked the one reef that doesn't have any goddamn islands. She doesn't know that, and I'm not saying this out loud.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Secret island.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you make your way to the Deeprow Reef, right off the shores of Vide Cay, you'll find an unguarded, old, ruined fort. There the item is being protected and held.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you stole my ship and came all this way to tell me that this item was not in your "possession and is another place. Why were you coming to the island? I'm very confused."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you see, Marquis LePual let us know that you were in dire need of it, and that there was heavy coin and glory in its delivery. Now, as you can see, I lost my original crew and found these bunch of fuckwits. You see, I do owe them a little bit of coin for their trouble, and I sure would hate to leave them empty-handed. Plus I want to see what happens when you're reunited with your treasure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, first off, Marius LePual is merely a bullshit messenger, but I'm glad at least he "could bring you to us. Is that all you know about the actual sphere?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's looking right into you, lids half-closed, this dagger stare of trying to read any sort of give.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Captain, I hope you understand that this is not my first rodeo. If I were to tell you everything that I know right now, why would you need me alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I heard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I heard, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: C-O-S-K-O, Cosko.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great pizza place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you can get your crew in bulk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no, take it easy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You see, this object, this sphere, it needs to return. There is a temple in there that is from "long ago, and has been since refitted by its current denizens. Something at the very bottom of "that temple requires to be reunioned, reunited with this thing I seek. So--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it, at the bottom of the temple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Does the name Uk'otoa mean anything to you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It sure as fuck doesn't. Could you say that again slower?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm losing a couple of things here and there, no offense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She throws a quick dagger in the direction of Caleb that drags the cheese from his hand and sticks to the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was I eating cheese?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My perception is so low! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stay away from the captain's cheese!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought that was a metaphor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a triple-aged Gouda!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but really, what did you say? What was the name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uk'otoa, the great leviathan."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gate of the leviathan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The great leviathan."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, the great leviathan!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know what that means?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a good sense of it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a fucking leviathan!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what the fuck that means!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's in your book!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping) [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what tattoo was it? You're Uk'otoa?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, she is the chosen of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're the chosen of Uk'o-- sorry. The sound--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You see, this great serpent once ruled the Lucidian Ocean."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Serpent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shortly after the Calamity washed this land clean "and Zehir, the Cloaked Serpent god, was banished long away, one of his greatest creations was left "to rule this ocean: Uk'otoa."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Uk'otoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The indigenous people of this series of islands, the Swavain Islands, called the Ki'Nau, "were granted the blessing of Uk'otoa."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Uk'otoa!

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Unlike some, I can hold my brine."

lines.text: She's not looking at me, right? I'm a (vocalizing). You have dreams? I've had dreams of being deep underwater. There's a giant eye that sees me. I hear a voice speaking to me, but I can't reply. Does that ring any bells?

Let's wait for Jamedi to return, if he's plotted out the "course to this temple."

When I saw the sphere, it reminded me of that eye.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, look.

lines.text: As long as I don't have to swim.
