lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's what it's always done! [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, which sword, what do you mean "sword"?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb can't hear any of this, but in the middle of the room he says: It is getting very kinky in that room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jester's just pacing back and forth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's speechless for a moment, you hear her breathe in suddenly, "Perhaps it was destiny."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perhaps it was. Do you know what will happen, if we--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (suggestive clicking) Sorry. I'm sorry, I'm sorry! [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know what will happen, if we take this sphere to the place of its choosing? Have you seen what's unleashed or have you only heard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've only heard. As far as I know, when these survivors of Zehir, this long sealed god "grew jealous, that they are the ones, who put Uk'otoa away, below the ocean."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Uk'otoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I'm correct, and this is one of the original temples, then I think we can bring him back."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I admit, I find myself very curious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is but one, there are three I know of."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three temples?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Three temples across the Swavain islands."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All of the same construct, all looking for the same, what do you call it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know if there's a name for it, I just call it the sphere. The eye."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll be honest, the dreams, that I have, it's mostly just feeling and an occasional word, "like he's being held back. I feel that if we can, one by one, release him from these bindings, he "can be more direct with us. Be more direct with his blessing. He will bequeath the sea unto us."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does the eye say to you? Anything you remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tells me to, to watch, to learn."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (grunting)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To consume?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To consume." [cheering and laughter]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just so much, you guys, it's just so much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Details.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is happening?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She steps around the desk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just places her fingers on the hilt of the sword, where the eye is. "Then you'll need your rest."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: M'lady.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you for sharing your story with me, I don't feel quite as alone in this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you for your honesty, eventually." [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like an onion, you got to peel it, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understood. Anyway," and she pulls her hand away, "Go, and may sweet dreams find you." [cheering]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I walk away! [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought they were going to make bumsen, but it did not happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They didn't, they didn't, they didn't?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the door opens and Fjord returns to the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We weren't listening to anything at all, we know everything. Can you please fill in the details?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was going on, what did you guys do? Huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want a seven-day-old banana?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, thank you. Where did that even come from? That's okay. Not much actually. She is far more under the influence of whatever this is than I initially thought. She took off her glove and there was an eye in the palm of her hand. And not another tattoo, I think it was like a fucking eye. Ah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I know. So she showed me hers and I showed her mine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eyes! Our eyes! On the sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you tell her the orb was inside of you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'm assuming, if she's got the eyeball on her hand, she has an orb inside of her, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't even think of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean it's got to be, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck do you mean "still"? [cheering]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know it's confusing; I like to stay inside this Zemnian accent so much, but I did not say that out loud. That was for the DM.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Question, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I did not stop watching her after he left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is she doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks out over the ocean and steps out to the railing, where she has to move away to get out of the visual perspective, and spends a minute or so looking over the water. Then turns back, goes and closes the door, walks over to underneath the main doorway, where that shrine is. She pulls a stool up to stand up to about eye level to where the shrine is. Then she pulls her glove off once more, makes a small cut on her finger, and drops a few pieces of blood onto the small iron shrine. It's maybe about that big and then puts the glove back on, mumbles a few words beneath her breath, though Frumpkin might not able to see from this perspective. Then goes ahead and snuffs the candles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So she did some arcane shit. Did she also look very hot and bothered?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that perception roll, I'd say you don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, man. Not for me, I'm real bad at seeing that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So eyeball, hand, you showed her yours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was she, I don't know, did she say anything else about--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, you're right. She actually said there was one before, that was also chosen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened to him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, when you asked what happened to him, what did she say? [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where was that fucking pigeon? We didn't get to that part, but I feel like, because I saw my former captain Vandren with the same sphere, that he might be the one that she was talking about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasping) Wait, wait, wait, wait.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if Vandren had a different sphere? What if there was like a whole bunch of them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a chance. She said that this temple that we're about to visit was one of three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's three. What if Vandren and you and she have them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah and they're all keys to the temple?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if Vandren had one and then she knew it and she killed Vandren. And now she's going to kill you and she's going to try to take your orb?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was on the ship when it exploded. I don't even--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did the ship explode, Fjord?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She has a ship with cannons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, Nott said that there's like a fuck ton of gunpowder under the ship, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I understand. Sabian, my crewmate, he went down and sabotaged the ship. He set off an explosion. That has to be what happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who was Sabian working for? Avantika?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If she has a sphere and can talk to the serpent gods, I'm assuming she has some sort of magical powers, like you have magical powers. She has cool robes and is wearing an amulet; that just screams magic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, well, so after you, you know, made the flirt talk, that I was watching.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The flirt talk?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, they were both pouring it on pretty thick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I think we were being pretty respectful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anyway, she is very interested in you and after you left her room, I watched a little bit longer and she did some cutting. She dropped a little bit of her blood on a miniature altar or something. Do you do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do not. Altar, the little iron piece above her doorway?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, she stood on a stool and she did a little.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I saw that on the way out. I don't do anything like that. I don't know what that would--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a question. She said that there was somebody that was before her?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She did; she said there was one other chosen besides herself and now me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you look at her other, did you get a closer look?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did, the tattoo.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did that look familiar?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have I seen that anywhere else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To you I would say no, not in the time that you saw it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he have any tattoos that had eyes in them? Like the peacock feathers?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He had nine of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She'd know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine eyes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, he also had that all-seeing eye on his back, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? [laughter]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean you roomed with him, Fjord didn't you see him naked?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: ASHLEY, TRAVIS
lines.text: Could be nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a lot of eyeballs around. Just saying things have eyes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just trying to be skeptical.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will say she seems a bit on the fanatical end. She spoke of acquiring powers that I can't even begin to comprehend. Control over the oceans and seas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or other follow--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? It sounds cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a lot, yeah, that's a big power.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But doesn't that sound like too much?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, what would you even do with that? What's the point of it, really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I know what I would do with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What would you do with it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell them to go away and go somewhere else, and have more land.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See, and that just a point of a higher motivation for something. I mean, there's got to be a step two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She seemed very maniacal, is the word that I would choose. She seemed very driven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deuce has a point, there's got to be a goal at the end of all those powers, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we'll find out tomorrow, I suppose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We will and in the meantime, I would suggest that we acted like we are as interested and motivated to see this through as her followers. Otherwise, I think we'll stick out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did she say anything else about what she wants?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, it sounded like she wanted power and a lot of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She does. Unleashing things that are too terrible to talk about, but you can use your imagination.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was that a dick joke? [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jessie, are you all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've just had this like really angry face in the corner for a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't know what you're talking about I'm just sitting there with my sketchbook, drawing Captain Avantika with daggers. Sticking into her like a voodoo doll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not drawing like this, you're drawing like this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, aggressively. I don't know what you're talking about, I'm happy over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it looks like the third pencil you've broken so I just wanted to-- Just curious. Fourth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, if we venture into this sticky wicket, do you share even in a small way similar desires as this woman? Do you want to control the sea?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the first time I've heard of it. I mean, it sounds incredible, but I can't even begin to fathom what that would be like. That responsibility, I don't know who I would be if I could wield something like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you are grappling with a great deal of power, we have watched you do it. Are you trying to understand this thing better, be free of it, master it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Understand it would be a start.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't know what to do until you understand it. I mean, that's step one and once you understand it, we'll try and help you make a reasonable decision about what to do with it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the closer you get to it, the weirder you get? What if you start feeling those urges, like she has and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What urges?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like the powerful urges.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good question.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I've asked Beau to check me and I'll check her on areas of aggression. If I start controlling the oceans and shit, maybe we'll talk about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Until then, I can only tell you I only want to know more about this and find out about what happened to my friend. That's as far as I'm thinking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do that, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's get some rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Try to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all get yourselves to sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I place the elf owl back on Beauregard's shoulder and go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is your mic not working?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, no, it's not working.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've lost Ashley.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Share with Tal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You share with Taliesin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll share, that's fine. So as you all go to sleep, finding yourself into an evening of rest, Fjord--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, goddamn it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we leave the stage, do we need to leave the stage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The light of a yellow eye now open from the hilt like a lantern, lighting a tangled forest of kelp before you. Bubbles escape the corner of your mouth, but you breath the waters calmly, like a thick vapor. "Learn." You search through the mass of shifting slick sea vines eventually coming upon the base of a staircase going up. "Grow." What do you do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I climb those motherfucking stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you ascend the cold stone stairs, the beam of the eye lighting the way, your passage is suddenly blocked by something. A statue; humanoid, but featureless. "Provoke."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll fire two blasts of Eldritch Blast at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The statue breaks apart, its various shards emerging from the detonation and slowly sinking in what is now the thick waters around you. As the head tumbles past the light of the edge of your sword, the face is recognizable in a flash: Sabian. You push beyond, continuing to ascend the stairs. You come upon another statue, larger and looming more than the last. What do you do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Witch Bolt, right to its chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the darkened energy arcs from the hilt of your blade, hitting it you watch as the cracks spider up the stone before it detonates into hundreds of shards of dark stone. You see half of the face slowly hit and clatter onto the stone before falling off to the side. Vandren. Do you continue up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The stairs, are they staying the same, is there anything at the foot of the statue after they break apart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking down the statue itself is now immaterial. You've entirely annihilated it and you glance over the side, and what few shards still remain, slowly drift beyond your view into the dark abyss below.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll move forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Revealing in the center of this chamber, an intricate circle in the ground, maybe two feet across. Beautiful ancient craftsmanship, detailed to depict a serpent body coiled. Carved eyes emerging from the creature's body every few inches. The center of the water is a circle of water, like a well. "Watching." What do you do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll summon the sword and hold the eye facing the circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you hold the blade up, you see the light hits the water and is absorbed by it. You don't see anything beneath it. It seems to be just a void that eats the light.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Void that eats the light. Can I walk into the center of the circle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step into it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I definitely do now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, is that what you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you step into the circle, it's only a few inches deep of water and your feet feel the bottom. It is shallow. You're now standing above it, it's only about two feet across, so it's basically you standing over the small pool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a ceiling, are there walls, are there statues in this space?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around you, you can see stone walls and you could see a ceiling above you. It is almost plain featureless room, aside from the very edges of stone stacked upon itself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Watching. Can I look into the eye of the sword, do I see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look towards the hilt and the eye stares back at you. The light temporarily blinding you for a moment, as you adjust.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck? Can I try and take the edge of the blade and press it into the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You press the blade in through the water and it hits the stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus. (English accent) I don't know what you want from me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No response. Then you hear once more, "Watch."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've stared at the eye. Fuck. I have no idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The handle of the sword is somewhat slick in your grasp from the water you've been traveling from before and you feel the blade almost trying to turn in your grasp, turning the eye away from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll let it go where it's leading and point it towards the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slowly finds its way resting facing down towards the pool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put your face in it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Can I put my face in the water? [cheering]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (pigeon cooing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You place your face down into the water, and as opposed to the stone surface you've seen there, it is this vacuous black void. There, you see in a sudden instant, the eye opens up before you, the bright yellow light enveloping you. Suddenly, there's searing heat and you pull back out of the pool and the entire chamber is filled with blazing hot steam. It hurts at first, but then, it begins to feel nice. This burning sensation crawling across your body, going instead from pain to a surge of strength. Of control, of purpose. The voice again says, "Reward." As you look up around you the stone falls away and on the distance you can see that horizon once more. Now an endless ocean. You can see the faint ripples of waves across a sourceless bit of moonlight. There you see dozens of ships coming towards you. What do you do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look behind myself real fast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Inky, infinite.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. Are there any pigeons in this dream? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach my hand out and try and control the ships?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you concentrate, looking towards the right of you, where it looks like four or five vessels are in a localized portion of this black, endless ocean. As you concentrate you see the water begin to boil beneath them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to go ahead and grab whatever the fuck that is and pull it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the ocean fires up like a spire, a pillar of solid ocean water. The ships are scattered in different directions, as it slams them down once more, scattering them into thousands of pieces of splintered wood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take both hands and do a coup de grace, two big (crashing) over the top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The center of the ocean parts, giving this slight vacuum. This dual-sided, abyssal crevice in the center of the ocean. On the opposite ends of where your hands rise, you watch the waves rise up and in one fell sweep, two solid crystalline walls of water slam together and then even out. As the ripples subside, all you can see are the thousands and thousands of glittering shards of what once were that armada.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Moses shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't wake up, don't wake up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [applause]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's somehow worse with that outfit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the rest of you come to consciousness in the morning, Fjord seems to be sleeping in a little bit before suddenly shooting up with a gasp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you have a dream?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (English accent) What? (regular voice) No, no, I didn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're drenched in sweat. Just throwing that out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Real soggy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, we were fighting crazy beasts and monsters and all this talk of serpents, I feel--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord! Are you lying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check. Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, why did you talk so funny for a moment?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, come on!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a fucking one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just woke up, I don't actually know what's going on right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough. Oh, but looking at passive insight for Beauregard and Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You sounded like you had a different accent for a moment there, Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not going to say anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. I'm so used to copying people, I get all sorts of stuff mixed up in my head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did I miss something, I don't--?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You sure you don't want to talk about it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Talk about the dream?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, it's just a dream. What's there to talk about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's really boring.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First thing in the morning, you're like, (sarcasm) "Oh, I know, it was amazing. Tell me more. "

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, wait, you guys didn't have any dreams of a similar nature, did you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we didn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What kind of dreams of a similar nature?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had this dream that I was walking in this field and then there was this banana tree right in front of me and I climbed it and I got some bananas and then they turned bad really fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so I think it had something to do with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then the grass was purple, and then this guy came up to me and he was like, "Whoa, I just "heard--" but then his face turned into an eagle and he flew away. What do you think it means?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should write those down, they're really important.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, as someone who still doesn't have any type of dreams, whatever's going on, it's not normal, I just want to point that out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She just wants you to know that you're not normal. Should we go off to our adventure now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys head your way up to the deck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Except that I pull Beau back while everyone proceeds upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Speaking as a massive liar, I think he is lying to us a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, we can know, just like I know about your shit, we can know about Fjord's shit, and we can just keep that on the down low, right? I'm interested in knowing about people's shit, not exposing it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. One eye open.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One eye open.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think he knows what he wants yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, and you think you do? You the authority on knowing what other people want?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm the authority on knowing what I want, Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He spoke with a different accent for a split second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've heard Fjord speak with a lot of different accents.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, to a purpose, not when he is waking up instantly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He clearly had some sort of fucking dream. We know that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He'll tell us when he wants to tell us, all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking off the way of the shore, you can see that The Mistake is currently grounded and looks like there's a small crew trying to do repairs. You're not quite sure to what extent and how long it'll take, but the ship seems to be at least the time being out of commission.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hopefully we can fix our Mistake at some point. That'd be nice. Thank you, sorry, carry on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see Vera, Captain Avantika and a few of the crew members are currently in a conversation with a man that you hadn't seen before. You see a gentleman completely bald head, very dark brown skin. A heavy leather coat with like a few belts or bandoliers attached to it. He has a satchel on the side and a few blades that are sheathed and hanging. He looks like an individual who's ready to travel. In case anything happens, he's prepared. Maybe a little cleaner than Caleb, but definitely a little ramshackle in appearance. They're in the middle of a conversation and as soon as you approach the deck, the Captain notices your presence and goes, "Good "morning! Come, it seems that our destined journey is just around the corner. Please, The Mighty "Nein, may I introduce you to a good friend who is hoping to be arrived soon, Jamedi. Jamedi, this is "The Mighty Nein." He turns to you all and goes, "It is a pleasure to meet you all. The Captain has "told me that we are to be traveling to the island together, yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oui.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is correct. It is a pleasure to meet you as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will tell you it is very dangerous. Bring what you think is necessary. The island itself is "indeed cursed for the creatures that call it home."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if you've explored it, why don't you tell us what's necessary to bring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was about to give you that before you so rudely interrupted me first thing in the morning."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, well, then go on. What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are villages of snake men that surround this "stone shrine. Their mutations are various and strange. I managed to avoid being seen and I made "it to the initial interior chambers of this village, of this stone obelisk of a temple, but I "surmised it would be best if I went further with aid of those who were capable of defending "themselves. So I came back. I do have a path that I think is of, how you say, least resistance, so I "would say bring what is important to perhaps deal with lizards and snakes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These lizard and snake people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did they seem nice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see any snake and lizard women and children?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There were various of both sexes and perhaps between. I do not know the full idea of these "creatures' physiology."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all you wanted to know, just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just wanted to know if they had happy families, that's all, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did they have feet or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not look too closely into the--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But what do they do for fun?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester, we're probably going to kill all of these people. Maybe we don't care what they do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would not suggest trying to kill them all. Trying to avoid them, expediency, using the "shadows, and travel without being found I think is our best bet at survival."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would agree. I think they're quite territorial. We would do best to remain unseen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you run into these people before, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I haven't, I'm--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you had dreams about them or something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, what was your comment?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this not ringing a bell for any of y'all's? Snake people, temples, the naga. We already fought them. Done this once before. Think that's where we got the little sphere thing that went in Fjord's thing, had a little circle with like a pool in it and you could see shit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They were like fish people, not like snake people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't remember any of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah they were like-- (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, but hear me out. Because we fought those people in the swamp, they were the merrow people, right? Maybe they're still worshiping the same type of serpentine deity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see where you're going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot of different people takes a lot of different types.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we were already in one of the temples that we're looking for? You said there were three, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I just said.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if that was a temple, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what you were going for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was totally going for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought it was like metaphorical that we were still in the temple and just having some elaborate, like a dream of life and we've all been in this temple all along and, I mean, that would have been really cool, although really convoluted the more I'm thinking about it. Doesn't make any sense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go stealthing in, Fjord, do you want to look at the dodecahedron or anything? Would that be good?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you, you're the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Captain goes, "What is a dodecahedron?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is a sigil of our group that is sometimes viewed just to focus one's energy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a pep talk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I don't think I need it. I'm very focused on the fucking job at hand and perhaps someone needs help with like stealth, you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should have looked at that first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Captain claps her hands twice again, to get everyone's attention. "Vera, look after the "ship. Look after our men, their men. Jamedi, lead the way. I am excited to see what we uncover "together, huh?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi turns to the rest of you and goes, "Now you "must be quiet. Move quickly, as the island has many denizens that would find us exotic meats. Are "we ready?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oui.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then come." He begins to lead the way in and Captain Avantika looks to us. "This will be "fun, yeah?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: [applause]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, oh man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take a bow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you to all our fantastic Critters at home that are watching this live or on VOD-- We love you too! This is perpetually such an incredible experience that continues to build on itself and the fact that we get to do it together is so amazing. A huge thank you to D&D Beyond for being our wonderful sponsor this week. Thank you to Momlan for being an amazing appearance. Thank you to my wonderful players for dealing with my crazy bullshit. Thank you all for just being you and making this so special for all of us. This is incredible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We love you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
